features: Shell: 3-layer recycled nylon, spandex stretch Gore-Tex fabric; zip-out jacket: polyester(70% recycled)taffeta; insulation: 700-fill-power Recycled Down
Attached, adjustable hood with visor; front zip with storm flap and interior wind flap; zip-through collar with microfleece-lined chin flap; adjustable cuffs
Zippered chest pocket and two security handwarmer pockets with drop-in pockets; interior has a zippered chest pocket and a drop-in pocket
Warm, attached, adjustable hood; zip-through, stand-up collar; zippered handwarmer pockets; zippered chest pocket; drop-in pocket on the inside
Jacket and shell attach via front zippers and snap loops at cuffs and neck; interior baffles keep down from shifting; hem adjusts with cords inside pockets
Shell: thigh length; zip-out jacket: hip length
Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor
